hero.title: Join recycling and earn money together!
hero.description: Sell your recyclables or buy recyclable materials here!

step1.title: 1. Collect & Prepare
step1.description: Gather your recyclable materials and sort them by type (plastic, paper, glass, metal). Clean and dry items to ensure optimal pricing.

step2.title: 2. List & Price
step2.description: Use our app to list your recyclables with photos and specifications. Our system provides real-time market pricing based on current demand.

step3.title: 3. Connect & Sell
step3.description: Connect with buyers in your area. Arrange pickup or drop-off at your convenience. Complete transactions securely through our platform.

step4.title: 4. Track & Verify
step4.description: Track your transactions and earnings. Verify completion and receive payments directly to your account. Maintain your sustainability impact score.

item1.content: This platform has made it so easy for me to sell my recyclables. The pricing is fair and the pickup service is convenient.

item2.content: As a community leader, I appreciate how this platform connects people who want to make a positive environmental impact.

item3.content: The secure payment system gives me confidence. I've earned extra income while contributing to environmental sustainability.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Recycling Journey?
cta.description: Join our community today and start earning money while helping the environment.

About.description: Learn more about our recycling platform, privacy practices, and terms of service that govern your use of our services.
About.our_mission_desc: We are dedicated to creating a sustainable future by connecting individuals and businesses with recycling opportunities. Our platform makes it easy to turn waste into value, contributing to environmental protection and economic benefits.
About.vision_desc: To become the leading platform that transforms waste management practices, creating a circular economy where every piece of recyclable material finds its way to the right place.
About.mission_desc: To make recycling accessible, rewarding, and impactful for everyone, while contributing to a cleaner and more sustainable world.
About.our_story_desc_p1: Founded in 2023, Recycle Waste Management started with a simple idea: making recycling easy and profitable. What began as a small initiative to connect local recyclers with buyers has grown into a comprehensive platform serving communities nationwide.
About.our_story_desc_p2: Today, we continue to innovate and expand our services, always keeping our core mission of environmental stewardship at the heart of everything we do.
About.privacy_intro_desc: This Privacy Policy explains how Recycle Waste Management collects, uses, discloses, and safeguards your information when you visit our website and use our services.
About.privacy_information_desc: We may collect information about you in a variety of ways. The information we may collect via the Website includes:
About.privacy_information_list3: Location information when you post recyclable items
About.privacy_information_list4: Communication preferences and customer service interactions
About.privacy_use_desc: We use the information we collect to operate, maintain, and provide features of our platform, including enabling communications between users, processing transactions, and sending updates about our services.
About.privacy_disclosure_desc: We may share information we have collected about you when required by law, when we have your permission, or when such disclosure is necessary to protect our rights and interests.
About.privacy_security_desc: We use administrative, technical, and physical security measures to help protect your personal information. While we have taken reasonable steps to secure the personal information you provide to us, please be aware that no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.
About.privacy_changes_desc: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the effective date.
About.privacy_contact_desc: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the support section of our platform.
About.terms_acceptance_desc: By accessing or using Recycle Waste Management, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations.
About.terms_description_desc: Recycle Waste Management provides a platform for users to buy and sell recyclable materials. We do not take ownership of the materials listed on our platform.
About.terms_user_registration_desc: When registering for our platform, you agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information about yourself and to maintain and update your information to keep it accurate, current, and complete.
About.terms_user_responsibilities_desc: As a user of our platform, you are responsible for:
About.terms_user_responsibilities_list1: Providing accurate information in your listings
About.terms_user_responsibilities_list2: Complying with local, state, and federal regulations regarding waste disposal
About.terms_user_responsibilities_list4: Maintaining the security of your account credentials
About.terms_platform_use_desc: You agree not to use our platform for any illegal purpose or in any way that could damage, disable, or impair our service. You also agree not to interfere with any other party's use and enjoyment of the service.
About.terms_content_desc: You retain any intellectual property rights that you hold in the content you submit to our platform. By submitting content, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, and distribute your content in connection with operating our platform.
About.terms_content_list1: You own or have the right to submit all content you post
About.terms_content_list2: Your content does not violate any third-party rights
About.terms_content_list3: Your content complies with applicable laws and regulations
About.terms_termination_desc: We may terminate or suspend your account immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.
About.terms_governing_desc: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Thailand, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
